title: Marlee Matlin
summary: Marlee Beth Matlin (born August 24, 1965) is an American actress, author, and deaf activist. For playing Sarah Norman in the romantic drama film Children of a Lesser God (1986), she won the Academy Award and Golden Globe Award for Best Actress, becoming the only deaf performer to have won an Academy Award as well as the youngest Best Actress winner.[1][2][3][4]
